articles.author: Clea Caulcutt
articles.title: Where's Macron? French president disappears amid election crisis - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The leader “underestimated how much the public were turned off by his personality,” one party official told POLITICO.
articles.content:
For the loquacious, daring 46-year-old president, who is forever grabbing the limelight, coming up with new ideas, disrupting the status quo, the new reality is not a comfortable one.
But like a Nap… [+1380 chars]
